column4: ok , thankyou both for the help I will try to install 7.10 in a few days when its released.   Now does anyone know how to install freebsd - j/k I have another machine for that
thanks again guys- i was playing about freebsd

honestly ubuntu has been the best distro by far that i've ever used, I love freebsd tho I was a user in the mid 90s and I have a pc dedicated to it at my feet so I am trying to relearn alot of things in a short time. Right now I have 2 ubuntu pcs and 2 freebsds
